about_the_game:
Original Soundtrack for Wishmere. Composed by Zack Parrish. 20 original tracks included:
  • The Chosen
  • The Nexus Connects Us
  • Pick a Card, Any Card
  • Overzealous
  • Pandemonium
  • Peace & Prosperity
  • Kick Back and Chill
  • Just Do It
  • If I Only Had a Heart
  • Unlocking the Secret
  • You're a Wizard, Larry
  • Comeback Was Ineffective
  • The Good
  • The Bad
  • The Ugly
  • Relinquish Your Inhibitions
  • I Doubt It
  • Undoubtedly
  • Punching Out
  • Are You Ready-

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 10.04
  • Processor: 2.0GHz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Required

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6
  • Processor: 2.0GHz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Required
